text: Nagaland, a state of India, has 12 administrative districts. ==Administration== A district of an Indian state is an administrative geographical unit. They are headed by a district magistrate or a deputy commissioner, an officer belonging to the Indian Administrative Service. The district magistrate or the deputy commissioner is assisted by officials belonging to different wings of state administrative services. ==Districts== The twelve districts of Nagaland state are: #Dimapur #Kiphire #Kohima #Longleng #Mokokchung #Mon #Peren #Phek #Tuensang #Wokha #Zunheboto #Noklak ==References== ==Other websites== *A Gateway to Districts of India Category:Nagaland
title: List of districts of Nagaland
